com.facebook.react.uimanager.util

类 ReactFindViewUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.react.uimanager.util.ReactFindViewUtil

  • public class ReactFindViewUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Finds views in React Native view hierarchies

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  ReactFindViewUtil.OnMultipleViewsFoundListener
      Callback to be invoked when all react native views with geiven NativeIds have been found
      static interface  ReactFindViewUtil.OnViewFoundListener
      Callback to be invoked when a react native view has been found

    • 方法详细资料

      • findView

        public static android.view.View findView(android.view.View root,
                                         java.lang.String nativeId)
        Finds a view that is tagged with as its nativeID prop under the view hierarchy. Returns the view if found, null otherwise.
        参数:
        root - root of the view hierarchy from which to find the view

      • findView

        public static void findView(android.view.View root,
                            ReactFindViewUtil.OnViewFoundListener onViewFoundListener)
        Finds a view tagged with 's nativeID in the given view hierarchy. If the view does not exist yet due to React Native's async layout, a listener will be added. When the view is found, the will be invoked.
        参数:
        root - root of the view hierarchy from which to find the view

      • addViewListener

        public static void addViewListener(ReactFindViewUtil.OnViewFoundListener onViewFoundListener)
        Registers an OnViewFoundListener to be invoked when a view with a matching nativeID is found. Remove this listener using removeViewListener() if it's no longer needed.

      • removeViewListener

        public static void removeViewListener(ReactFindViewUtil.OnViewFoundListener onViewFoundListener)
        Removes an OnViewFoundListener previously registered with addViewListener().

      • addViewsListener

        public static void addViewsListener(ReactFindViewUtil.OnMultipleViewsFoundListener listener,
                                    java.util.Set<java.lang.String> ids)

      • removeViewsListener

        public static void removeViewsListener(ReactFindViewUtil.OnMultipleViewsFoundListener listener)

      • notifyViewRendered

        public static void notifyViewRendered(android.view.View view)
        Invokes any listeners that are listening on this 's native id
